Title: An Armory of Swords.

Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=EaRCHQAACAAJ&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: Saberhagen has brought together some of the best fantasy writers in the field to create their own stories within the universe of his Lost Swords series. This book features works by Walter Jon Williams, Sage Walker, and a new tale by the master himself--Fred Saberhagen's "Blind Man's Blade"--reveals how the Swords were originally thrust into the human realm..
